content.title: National Awards For Empowerment Of Persons With Disabilities: National Awards For Institutions Engaged In Empowering Persons With Disabilities: Divyangjano Ke Liye Sarvshrestha Niyoktha
content.department: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
content.beneficiary: Persons with Disabilities, Institutions Engaged in Empowering Persons With Disabilities
content.details: The 'National Awards for Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities' are awarded by the Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities, Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment every year since 1969 in recognition of the skills and contribution of persons with disabilities, individuals and institutions engaged in the empowerment of persons with disabilities.
benefits: Awardee receives a Certificate and a Shield
Boarding and lodging expenses of the awardees and one escort are borne by the Department
To and fro travelling expenses and accommodation for up to one day prior to and after the awards ceremony are arranged and reimbursed
eligibility: Outstanding employers of the disabled under Government organization
Public Sector Undertaking or Autonomous Body or Local Government Body
content.application_process: Online application through the National Awards Portal, which is open from 15th June to 31st July.
documents_required: Certificate of Registration (showing the Year of Establishment)
Proofs regarding the Nature of work undertaken by the Institution
Special or Outstanding Achievements in the past 10 years
Details of Awards or Honours received, if any
Any other Achievement for Consideration of the Award

faqs.question: When Was The 'National Award For The Empowerment Of Persons With Disabilities' First Introduced?
faqs.answer: The 'National Award for the Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities' was first introduced in the year 1969.

faqs.question: What Are The Objectives Of These Awards?
faqs.answer: The awards are conferred to recognize the skills and contributions of persons with disabilities, individuals and institutions engaged in the empowerment of persons with disabilities.

faqs.question: When Are These Awards Conferred?
faqs.answer: The awards are conferred on 3rd December every year, which is the International Day of Persons with Disabilities.

faqs.question: Who Confers These Awards?
faqs.answer: The awards are conferred by the Hon'ble President or Hon'ble Vice President of India at Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi.

faqs.question: Does This Scheme Accept Offline Applications?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme only accepts online applications.
